meanings.definition: A type of explosive consisting of ammonium nitrate and aluminum powder.
meanings.sent1: The workers carefully handled the ammonal to avoid any accidents.
meanings.sent2: The military used ammonal to create controlled explosions during training.
meanings.sent3: When the prankster replaced the flour with ammonal in the bakery, the bread rose too quickly!
meanings.sent4: The power of the explosion was like a thunderous symphony, the notes played by the dancing ammonal.
meanings.sent5: The bright flash and deafening boom of the detonated ammonal left a lasting impression on the spectators.
